) } const inputs = document.querySelectorAll(".input"); function focusFunc() { let parent = this.parentNode; parent.classList.add("focus"); } function blurFunc() { let parent = this.parentNode; if (this.value == "") { parent.classList.remove("focus"); } } inputs.forEach((input) => { input.addEventListener("focus", focusFunc); input.addEventListener("blur", blurFunc); }); export default ContactMe
